GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
usb: cdns3: change place of 'priv_ep' assignment in cdns3_gadget_ep_dequeue(), cdns3_gadget_ep_enable()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit eb82c0382285ee17a9966aaab27b8becb08eb1ac, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 7733f6c32e36ff9d7adadf40001039bf219b1cbe. For more details please see the references link.
